org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.graph

Class InvalidationBytesCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.graph.InvalidationBytesCalculator

  • public class InvalidationBytesCalculator
extends Object
    Helper class to calculate bytes invalidated by changing a ICompilationUnit

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InvalidationBytesCalculator() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Map<ICompilationUnit,Integer> calculateBytesChanged(Collection<ICompilationUnit> units) 
      static Map<ICompilationUnit,Integer> calculateTotalInvalidatedBytesChanged(Collection<ICompilationUnit> units)
      Calculates how many bytes needs to be recompiled for each unit in the list of units This will walk through the graph for each unit and add up the number of bytes for each unique compilation unit that needs to be changed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InvalidationBytesCalculator

        public InvalidationBytesCalculator()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateBytesChanged

        public static Map<ICompilationUnit,Integer> calculateBytesChanged(Collection<ICompilationUnit> units)
                                                           throws InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        units - A collection of compilation units.
        Returns:
        A Map from each ICompilationUnit in units to the number of bytes its ABC bytecode contains
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • calculateTotalInvalidatedBytesChanged

        public static Map<ICompilationUnit,Integer> calculateTotalInvalidatedBytesChanged(Collection<ICompilationUnit> units)
                                                                           throws InterruptedException
        Calculates how many bytes needs to be recompiled for each unit in the list of units This will walk through the graph for each unit and add up the number of bytes for each unique compilation unit that needs to be changed.
        Parameters:
        units - The units that we want invalidation byte info for
        Returns:
        A map from each compilation unit in the param units to an Integer representing how many bytes the change of that unit invalidated
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
